org.dsa.iot.dslink.config

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.config.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the configuration of a DSLink.

      • setKeys

        public void setKeys(java.lang.String serializedKeys)
        Sets the serialized keys. A deserialization will be performed when setting these keys. If the serialized keys are not set, then one will be automatically generated.
        Parameters:
        serializedKeys - Serialized keys to set
        See Also:
        LocalKeys.deserialize(String)

      • setKeys

        public void setKeys(LocalKeys keys)
        Sets the local keys. These keys are used in the handshake.
        Parameters:
        keys - Keys to set
        See Also:
        LocalKeys

      • getKeys

        public LocalKeys getKeys()
        Returns:
        Local keys used in the handshake.

      • setConnectionType

        public void setConnectionType(ConnectionType type)
        Sets the designated connection type. This is used for connecting to a data endpoint after the handshake is complete.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of connection

      • getConnectionType

        public ConnectionType getConnectionType()
        Designated connection type used when connecting to data endpoint.
        Returns:
        Connection type to be used

      • setDsId

        public void setDsId(java.lang.String dsId)
        Do not set the ID with the public key hash. It will be automatically appended during the handshake setup.
        Parameters:
        dsId - ID to set

      • getDsId

        public java.lang.String getDsId()
        Gets the raw ID of this DSLink. The public key hash has not been appended to it.
        Returns:
        DsID

      • getDsIdWithHash

        public java.lang.String getDsIdWithHash()
        Gets the full ID of this DSLink.
        Returns:
        DsId with public key hash appended to it.

      • setZone

        public void setZone(java.lang.String zone)
        This variable is only effective when the broker needs to approve of this DSLink. When approved, the broker will take you out of this zone and place the link in a normal designated area.
        Parameters:
        zone - Zone the broker should place this DSLink in.

      • getZone

        public java.lang.String getZone()
        Returns:
        Requested zone

      • setRequester

        public void setRequester(boolean requester)
        Parameters:
        requester - Whether the DSLink is a requester or not.

      • isRequester

        public boolean isRequester()
        Returns:
        Whether the DSLink is a requester or not.

      • setResponder

        public void setResponder(boolean responder)
        Parameters:
        responder - Whether the DSLink is a requester or not.

      • isResponder

        public boolean isResponder()
        Returns:
        Whether the DSLink is a requester or not.

      • setLinkData

        public void setLinkData(JsonObject data)
        Sets the extra link data. This data can be used by any requester to determine how it should handle the DSLink.
        Parameters:
        data - Link data.

      • getLinkData

        public JsonObject getLinkData()
        Returns:
        Link data.

      • setSerializationPath

        public void setSerializationPath(java.io.File file)
        Sets the serialization path. This location determines where serialization and deserialization will occur.
        Parameters:
        file - Serialization path, can be null.

      • getSerializationPath

        public java.io.File getSerializationPath()
        Returns:
        Serialization path, can be null.

        Validates the configuration for any issues.
